text: Atahpara tamra sampradayera netara yara kuphari karechila, tara balala [1], ‘amara to tomake amadera mata ekajana manusa chara kichu dekhachi na; amara to dekhachi, tomara anusarana karache tara'i, yara amadera madhye bahyika drstite'i adhama ebam amara amadera upara tomadera kono sresthatba dekhachi na [2], baram amara tomaderake mithyabadi mane kari.’
